referable-content.title: [RC:note] TiS Restrictions for applying storage profiles

note.p: CGTS-4138 addedStorage profiles for compute-based or CPE ephemeral storage (that is, storage profiles containing volume group and physical volume information) can be applied in two scenarios:

li.p: on initial installation where a nova-local volume group has not been previously provisioned
on a previously provisioned host where the nova-local volume group has been marked for removal

note.p: On a previously provisioned host, delete the nova-local volume group prior to applying the profile.
